question:
Informal summit between PM Narendra Modi and Chinese President Xi is to be held in Mamallapuram. In that context, consider the following statements:
  1. Mamallapuram was part of Pallava Kingdom.
  2. Wuhan is the capital of the Chinese Province of Hubei.
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: Statement 1 is correct: Mamallapuram or Mahabalipuram is located in Kanchipuram District in the state of Tamil Nadu. It was an ancient historic town and one of the two major port cities in 7th Century within the Pallava Kingdom. The Pallavas had trade relations with the Chinese. Statement 2 is correct: Known as “China’s thoroughfare”, it is the capital and the largest city of the Chinese Province of Hubei. It is the most populous city in Central China. It is the seventh most populous Chinese City and one of the nine National Central Cities in China.
